name: Invasion Zero (itch)
description:
1. Invasion Zero An old school style space shooter where four young people will stop an alien invasion. Game created based on a personal challenge between me and a friend of mine, to develop a game from scratch, within a week, being the first experimental game we made. THIS GAME DOES NOT HAVE A SAVE SYSTEM. I'M SORRY.
  2. CONTROLS: - WASD: move - E or Shift: Shield - Q or R: Special Attack - SPACE: shooter
  3. A game created by DRX e RW Instagram: @prod.drx & @RWM64 twitter: @ProdGuilherme & @SunsetNeon64.
  4. Sound effects and musics obtained from https://www.newgrounds.com/
